doc.title: Bitchin' Blonde
doc.plot: Ever since Andrea could remember, she wanted to be famous and have her own show. After being discovered by Howard Stern she finally got her wish and was crowned "Miss Howard Stern". Now her growing number of rabid fans been begging for more of Andrea's adventures ever since. Finally, you will get your wish when you see this motion picture. Now see Andrea all grown up and in with very own sexy movie as she proves once and for all what it means to be a dumb blond! Travel on tour with Andrea cross country, through L.A., Las Vegas, New York and more while PARTYING, PROMOTING, and of course, always POSING! She's FUNNY, HOT, and TOTALLY OUT OF CONTROL!
